column2: "Ao Israelmba
column3: hom ntsie asɛm bi a mema do dɛ kwadwom wɔ hom ho."

column2: "Israel baabun ahwe ase; ɔronnsoɛr bio: wɔatow no akyen wɔ n'asaase do; obi nnyi hɔ a ɔma no do."
"Na mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye yi: Kurow a ɔdze apem tui no
column3: ɔbɛka no ɔha
column4: na dza ɔdze ɔha tui no

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE se Israelmba nye yi
column3: Hom nhwehwɛ me

column2: "na mma nnhwehwɛ Bɛtɛl
column3: eso mma hom nnhɛn Gilgal
column4: na mma hom nntwa mu nnkɔ Beer-seba: na ndɔmmum ara na Gilgal bɔkɔ

column2: "Hom nhwehwɛ EWURADZE
column3: na hom enya nkwa; amma oeemmpue dɛ gya wɔ Josef fi mu na ɔaannhyew osiandɛ obi nnyi hɔ a obodum no wɔ Bɛtɛl:"

column2: "hom a hom dan atsɛmbu bɔwen
column3: na hom dze tsenenee hwehwe famu;"

column2: "hwehwɛ onyia no a ɔyɛ nworaba a bi nye Aberwa na mba na Etsekwagyan
column3: na ɔdan sum kebii adzekyee
column4: na ɔma adzekyee hyɛ anadwe sum; ɔno a ɔfrɛ po nsu
column5: na ohue gu asaase enyi no; EWURADZE nye ne dzin;"

column2: "ɔno a ɔma ɔsɛɛ pue awora ba ɔhoɔdzennyi do
column3: na ɔma ɔsɛɛ ba abankɛse do no."

column2: "Wɔtan nyia ɔka enyim wɔ abobokɛse mu
column3: na wokyir nyia ɔkasa tɔɔtsen."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi susuampaara dɛ hom tsiatsia ɔbɔbɔfo do
column3: na hom gye no hɔ apempem ewifua ntsi: hom esisi abo twae adan
column4: naaso hom renntsena mu; hom atsetsɛw wenyin nture fɛɛfɛw

column2: "Na minyim mbrɛ hom mbrato dua dɔɔ so
column3: na mbrɛ hom bɔn dua yɛ dzen; hom a hom hiahia ɔtseneneenyi ho
column5: na hom kyea ehiafo asɛm wɔ kuropɔn mu (asɛndzii)."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔbadwembanyi no bɛyɛ komm wɔ dɛm ber no mu; osiandɛ ɔyɛ ber bɔn."
"Hom nhwehwɛ papa
column3: na nnyɛ bɔn a
column4: ama hom eenya nkwa: nna EWURADZE
column6: nye hom bɛtsena dɛ mbrɛ hom ka no."

column2: "Hom ntan bɔn
column3: na hom ndɔ papa
column4: na hom ntsintsim atsɛmbu wɔ asɛndzii: na bi a EWURADZE

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Jehova
column3: dɔm Nyankopɔn
column5: mbrɛ ɔse nye yi: Ewuotwa bɛba abɔntsen nyinara do; na wɔbɛka wɔ abrɔn nyinara mu dɛ
column6: Ebei! Ebei! Na wɔbɛfrɛ okuafo ma oedzi nkɔmbɔ

column2: "Na ewuotwa bɛba wenyin nture nyina mu: osiandɛ mubotwa mu edua wo mu
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Hom a hom afe EWURADZE ne da no
column3: hom ndue! Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom repɛ EWURADZE ne da no? Hwɛ ɔyɛ sum o

column2: "Ɔtse dɛ nyimpa bi ruguan gyata
column3: na osisi ehyia no anaa ɔaba fie dze ne nsa akɔtwer ban

column2: "Aso EWURADZE ne da no nnyɛ sum na ɔbɛyɛ
column3: na nnyɛ kan o? Sum katoo a hyerɛn biara nnyi mu a."

column2: "Mikyir
column3: na mopow hom afahyɛ nda no
column4: na mirinnya enyigye biara wɔ hom ehyiadzi krɔnkrɔn no mu."

column2: "Nyew
column3: sɛ hom dze hom ɔhyew afɔr na edziban afɔr brɛ me mpo a
column4: m'enyi ronnsɔ: eso murummbu hom mbowa a wɔadɔ seradze no ho asomdwee afɔr no bi."

column2: "Fa w'adwontow ne dede no fi mo do; na mirinntsie w'asanku ne dɛɛdɛw no."
"Mbom hom mma atsɛmbu mpem mbra dɛ nsu
column3: na ndzeyɛtsenenee mbra dɛ nsu pramee."

column2: "Ao Israelmba
column3: ana hom na wɔdze okum afɔr na ayɛyɛdze brɛɛ me wɔ sar no do mfe eduanan no?"

column2: "Ɛhɛɛ
column3: hom asoa hom hen Sakut na hom ehonyi Kiun
column4: ɔbosom a hom yɛe maa hom ho no nworaba."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na mebɛma hom akɔ ndɔmmum atra Damaskɔs
column3: EWURADZE a ne dzin dze dɔm Nyankopɔn no
